greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 if the 2-adic and 3-adic valuations of A025487(n) are equal, 0 otherwise.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..47617
formula: a(n) = [A007814(A025487(n)) == A007949(A025487(n))], where [ ] is the Iverson bracket.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 24 2019
